Package level2Assignment1

Class Name

java.lang.Object
level2Assignment1.Name
public class Name extends Object
Represents a person's name, including first, middle, last names, and an optional salutation. This class provides functionality to manage and format a person's name for display.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Name()
    Default constructor for creating a Name instance without any name information.
    Name(String name)
    Constructs a new Name instance parsing a single string containing the full name.
    Name(String first, String last)
    Constructs a new Name instance with specified first and last names.
    Name(String first, String middle, String last)
    Constructs a new Name instance with specified first, middle, and last names.

  • Constructor Details

    • Name

      public Name(String name)
      Constructs a new Name instance parsing a single string containing the full name. The name can be provided in "last,first" format or "first last" format.
      Parameters:
      name - the full name in either "last,first" or "first last" format.

    • Name

      public Name()
      Default constructor for creating a Name instance without any name information.

    • Name

      public Name(String first, String last)
      Constructs a new Name instance with specified first and last names.
      Parameters:
      first - the first name of the person.
      last - the last name of the person.

    • Name

      public Name(String first, String middle, String last)
      Constructs a new Name instance with specified first, middle, and last names.
      Parameters:
      first - the first name of the person.
      middle - the middle name of the person.
      last - the last name of the person.
